author: cms-externals
body:
This should suppress the build warnings like [a]
[a]
```
boost/type_traits/has_nothrow_assign.hpp:65:7: warning: builtin __has_nothrow_assign is deprecated; use __is_nothrow_assignable instead [-Wdeprecated-builtins]
```
title: Replace deprecated intrinsics: boostorg/type_traits/commit/a1d0b207c523c13b4fa46fd9b77bdb15ce554051
